Flow.description: GTMS-16293: Updated flow to map Note__c field on opportunity with Lead field value from Create_Opp_for_Converted_Deal_Reg_Lead flow. Mapped Partern Oppty Description field on CR with More About Opportunity in lead on 2/1/24 GTMS-20575: Add Partner _Registration__c object record Update element to update opportunity field GTMS-25123: Replaced/Referenced Reseller View PE package references in the flow GTMS-26124 & GTMS-26107: Updated partner Program, Partner Enrollment and Partner Interaction Type field values in CR GTMS-26973: Updated logic to check if the Auto Source CR is created or not GTMS-29684: removed customer account and customer contact SOQL queries for efficiency
Flow.label: New Create Partner Rebate Opportunity

textTemplates.name: ErrorMessageEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Error occurred while creating an opportunity for the Deal Registration


Lead Id - {!ConvertedLeadId}

Customer Account Id - {!EndCustomerAccount}

Customer Contact Id - {!EndCustomerContact}

Partner Account Id - {!PartnerSFAccount}

Partner Contact Id - {!PartnerSFContact}


Error Message - {!$Flow.FaultMessage}
